title: Fey Ancestry
content:
Fey Ancestry Effect The Feywild casts a veil over your mind. You have Advantage on Saving Throws against being Charmed, and magic can't put you to Sleep. Requirements Elf, Drow, Half-Elf

The Feywild casts a veil over your mind. You have Advantage on Saving Throws against being Charmed, and magic can't put you to Sleep.

Elf, Drow, Half-Elf

Fey Ancestry is a Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and
